languages.text: "Вы понимаете". {n}Соломон шумно выдыхает.{/n} "Долго же это меня глодало... Наверное, мне просто надо было, чтобы другой человек озвучил мои собственные мысли. Спасибо".
"You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."
languages.original_text: "Вы понимаете". {n}Соломон шумно выдыхает.{/n} "Долго же это меня глодало... Наверное, мне просто надо было, чтобы другой человек озвучил мои собственные мысли. Спасибо".

"You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

languages.text: 「あなたは理解しておられる」{n}ソロモーンは大きく息を吐いた。{/n}「ずっと胸の奥で引っかかっていたんです…おそらく、誰か他の人の口から、私の考えを聞きたかっただけなのだと思います。ありがとうございます」
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは理解しておられる」{n}ソロモーンは大きく息を吐いた。{/n}「ずっと胸の奥で引っかかっていたんです…おそらく、誰か他の人の口から、私の考えを聞きたかっただけなのだと思います。ありがとうございます」

languages.text: "Ihr versteht es." {n}Solomorne atmet laut aus.{/n} "Das hat so lange an mir genagt ... Ich habe wohl nur einen anderen Menschen gebraucht, der meine eigenen Gedanken laut ausspricht. Danke."
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versteht es." {n}Solomorne atmet laut aus.{/n} "Das hat so lange an mir genagt ... Ich habe wohl nur einen anderen Menschen gebraucht, der meine eigenen Gedanken laut ausspricht. Danke."

languages.text: « Vous avez compris, {n}vous répond Solomorne en soupirant.{/n} Cette question me ronge depuis si longtemps... Mais je crois que j'avais besoin de l'entendre de la bouche d'un autre être humain. Merci. »
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez compris, {n}vous répond Solomorne en soupirant.{/n} Cette question me ronge depuis si longtemps... Mais je crois que j'avais besoin de l'entendre de la bouche d'un autre être humain. Merci. »

languages.text: «Usted lo entiende». {n}Solomorne exhala con fuerza.{/n} «Llevaba mucho tiempo carcomiéndome... Imagino que necesitaba oír a otro ser humano decir en voz alta lo que yo ya pienso. Gracias».
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: «Usted lo entiende». {n}Solomorne exhala con fuerza.{/n} «Llevaba mucho tiempo carcomiéndome... Imagino que necesitaba oír a otro ser humano decir en voz alta lo que yo ya pienso. Gracias».

languages.text: “就像你想的那样。”{n}索罗蒙长长地呼了口气。{/n}“这件事情已经在我心里烂了太久……我可能只是希望能有另一个人听我说说这些，谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: “就像你想的那样。”{n}索罗蒙长长地呼了口气。{/n}“这件事情已经在我心里烂了太久……我可能只是希望能有另一个人听我说说这些，谢谢你。”

languages.text: "Anlıyorsunuz." {n}Solomorne, sesli bir şekilde nefes veriyor.{/n} "Bu öyle uzun zamandır beni içten içe kemiriyordu ki... Galiba kendi düşüncelerimi başka birinden duymaya ihtiyacım varmış. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorsunuz." {n}Solomorne, sesli bir şekilde nefes veriyor.{/n} "Bu, beni içten içe öyle uzun zamandır kemiriyordu ki... Galiba kendi düşüncelerimi başka birinden duymaya ihtiyacım varmış. Teşekkür ederim."

languages.original_text: "You understand." {n}Solomorne exhales loudly.{/n} "It has been gnawing at me for so long... I guess I just needed to hear another human being voice my own thoughts. Thank you."
